| would like some form of the UN Human Rights act to be taught in schools across England and Wales.
We are all human therefore we should all be aware of our rights. Children should be socialized into knowing the human rights of everyone in order to respect one another.
The generation of today knows too little about their rights and it needs to be taken much more seriously in order to create equality and end discrimination. This can be achieved by future generations, if we educate them.
